overview: Alexander graduated from Moscow state institute of electronics and mathematics with degree in mathematical methods in economics in 2009. In 2008 he started to work at KPMG in audit department. In 2010 he trasfered to transactions and restructuring department. In 2011 Alexander entered New economic school (master in finance). Also in 2011 he and his partner decided to launch a startup with an idea to copy new ineresting web-services for Russian audience.

degrees.subject: mathematical methods in economics
degrees.institution: Moscow state institute of electronics and mathematics
